node.title: SA Governor isolating after being identified as close contact of COVID-19 case
node.alt: Frances Adamson speaks into a microphone while at Parliament House
node.description: South Australia's Governor is in isolation and the state's Opposition Leader and his deputy return negative COVID-19 tests, after all being identified as close contacts of a COVID-19 case.
node.content:
["South Australia's Governor is in isolation after being identified as a close contact of a confirmed COVID-19 case.", "The ABC understands Governor Frances Adamson this week met with former Premier Jay Weatherill, who has tested positive to the virus.", "She was tested last night and returned a negative result.", "Government House has issued a statement saying Governor Adamson will isolate for as long as advised by SA Health.", "In the meantime, the Lieutenant-Governor will be appointed as administrator of the state.", "Meanwhile, SA's Opposition Leader Peter Malinauskas and his deputy Susan Close have returned negative COVID-19 tests after also being identified as close contacts of the former premier.", "The pair will still have to isolate for seven days under state health guidelines.", "", "
SA Opposition Leader Peter Malinauskas left parliament on Wednesday night to get\u00a0a COVID-19 test at Victoria Park.(Twitter: Peter Malinauskas)
", "As a result of the two MPs being identified as close contacts, South Australia's parliament will be adjourned this morning\u00a0and all MPs and staff directed to avoid in-person meetings.", "It comes after former premier Jay Weatherill contracted COVID-19 after attending an event\u00a0over the weekend where other cases were present.", "Mr Weatherill, who works for Andrew Forrest's Minderoo Foundation, was in Adelaide to begin an interstate tour as CEO of the foundation's Thrive by Five campaign, promoting early childhood development.", "He held a press conference on Monday morning and was set to speak at other events in Victoria in the coming days.", "An Adelaide breakfast radio show is also broadcasting from quarantine this morning after Mr Weatherill visited the station, FiveAA, for an interview on Tuesday.", "
School closed for staff contact tracing
", "Meanwhile, a school\u00a0in Adelaide's north-west, Ocean View College B-12, is closed for cleaning and contact tracing today after confirming a member of its school community had tested positive.", "", "
Ocean View College B-12, in Adelaide's north-west, is closed for contact tracing and cleaning today.(ABC News: Claire Campbell)
", "\"SA Health will contact close or casual contacts to provide more information,\" a statement from the Department of Education said on Wednesday night.", "\"In the meantime, we encourage staff and students to monitor for any COVID-19 symptoms, test if symptomatic and isolate until you receive a negative result.\"", "Department for Education chief executive Rick Pearse said the school was closed to allow contact tracers to find out which staff were affected.", "He said the school community member who had tested positive was \"mixed up in the same event, I understand, as former premier Jay Weatherill\".", "Mr Pearse said \"a lot\" of the staff had been designated as either casual or close contacts, but that the department\u00a0\"works really closely with SA Health\" to manage cases in schools.", "\"One of my most senior people is embedded into their control centre there,\" he said.", "\"This will be something that we'll start to see a bit of as the virus starts to infiltrate the community.\""]
